p: Incidence rates vary according to the age group, reaching the highest rate (136/100,000) in infants under 12 months old and then dropping to 19/100,000 in children between 1 and 4 years old (Fig. 28.4). Cases in patients under 1 year old represent 42% of all notified cases and, of those, 82% are under 6 months old.
